Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: at least GenAI will read my assignment or passage and give me feedback. Most of the time my teacher just skim and give me feedback. For example, they always said you should put XXX in the assignment while it is already present. They don't have the time to go into details with student.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Teacher feedback are not indepth and sometime confusing. Especially when marking team and teaching team are not the same people, they always have different standard and requirement.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: teacher feedback have authority, what they say is right or wrong will impact the grading.
